sourcesContent:
import { Room, Standard } from './Room';

export const MOCK_ROOMS: Room[] = [
  new Room({
    hotelId: 1,
    roomNr: 101,
    name: "Ocean View Suite",
    standard: "Apartament" as Standard,
    capacity: 4,
    description: "A luxurious suite with a breathtaking view of the ocean.",
    price: 250,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room1.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 2,
    roomNr: 202,
    name: "Downtown King Room",
    standard: "Hotel" as Standard,
    capacity: 2,
    description: "A modern room located in the heart of the city with king-size bed.",
    price: 120,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room2.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 3,
    roomNr: 303,
    name: "Cozy Hostel Room",
    standard: "Hostel" as Standard,
    capacity: 6,
    description: "An affordable and comfortable dormitory-style room.",
    price: 25,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room3.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 4,
    roomNr: 404,
    name: "Country Homestay",
    standard: "Homestays" as Standard,
    capacity: 3,
    description: "Experience a home-like stay in the countryside with family-style hospitality.",
    price: 70,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room4.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 5,
    roomNr: 505,
    name: "Luxury Presidential Suite",
    standard: "Apartament" as Standard,
    capacity: 6,
    description: "A grand suite with top-notch amenities and services, ideal for high-profile guests.",
    price: 500,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room5.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 6,
    roomNr: 606,
    name: "Comfortable Queen Room",
    standard: "Hotel" as Standard,
    capacity: 2,
    description: "A cozy room perfect for couples or solo travelers, featuring a queen-size bed.",
    price: 100,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room6.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 7,
    roomNr: 707,
    name: "Budget Hostel Bed",
    standard: "Hostel" as Standard,
    capacity: 1,
    description: "A simple and affordable bed in a shared room, ideal for backpackers.",
    price: 15,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room1.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 8,
    roomNr: 808,
    name: "Peaceful Garden Homestay",
    standard: "Homestays" as Standard,
    capacity: 4,
    description: "Relax and rejuvenate in a serene homestay surrounded by nature.",
    price: 90,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room1.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 9,
    roomNr: 909,
    name: "Penthouse Suite",
    standard: "Apartament" as Standard,
    capacity: 5,
    description: "An opulent penthouse suite with panoramic city views and exclusive amenities.",
    price: 400,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room1.jpg",
  }),
  new Room({
    hotelId: 10,
    roomNr: 1010,
    name: "Economy Double Room",
    standard: "Hotel" as Standard,
    capacity: 2,
    description: "A budget-friendly double room with essential comforts for travelers.",
    price: 80,
    imageUrl: "/assets/room1.jpg",
  }),
];
